item.description:
Our friends at WXGR 101.5 fm Portsmouth/Dover have invited our Cocktail Meetup to their Gourmet Lounge LIVE from Blue Sky on York Beach in the magnificent Atlantic House Hotel.

The Gourmet Lounge is a LIVE Cooking Show featured on Friday night's on the radio.
If you have never been to Blue Sky you will be amazed at the stunning lounge atmosphere.
Our meetup will sit and enjoy the show from the 20 seat food bar and sample some of the finest cusine in the northeast.

There will be music and dancing to follow the show with musical guest the Green Lion Crew...supurb sounds, reggae and rock steady plus the music of WXGR.

ITS DEFINETELY WORTH THE TRIP!!

JUST ANNOUNCED....Stay at the fantastic Atlantic Beach Hotel that night for just $59 for a room or $89 for a suite that seeps 4 !!!! This place is awsome and the rooms will go fast...
item.name: WXGR 101.5 FM Gourmet Lounge LIVE from Blue Sky On York Beach
